column1: Little Goat Diner////First time visiting the Little Goat Diner and I was so happy that I did. Although I'm not GF
column2: DF or Vegan I was so impressed that they have specific menus for each. I had the smoked corned beef hash with eggs and a sourdough pancake as my side. The portions are very large and especially delicious. My friend had the Fat Elvis Waffles (waffles with bananas
column4: bacon and maple syrup) and she loved them. Our waitress was fantastic
column5: so friendly and helpful. I highly recommend the Little Goat Diner for anyone spending time or living in Chicago.
